data.eml:eml: A new distinctively banded species of Pseudolithoxus (Siluriformes: Loricariidae) from the upper Orinoco River

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lujan, Nathan K., Birindelli, Jose L. O. (2011): A new distinctively banded species of Pseudolithoxus (Siluriformes: Loricariidae) from the upper Orinoco River. Zootaxa 2941: 38-46, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.278154
